author: deweese
msg: 2) Modified ConcreteBackgroundRable to match the most likely outcome of the
enable-background discussion (we now pass the current feComposite).
3) RasterRable now uses a worker thread for base64 data.
RasterRable will now generate a (fairly ugly) 'broken image' image when
it is unable to decode the image for what ever reason.

author: billh
msg: Added new version of Selectable interface (with boolean returned by selectTo()).

author: billh
msg: Changed text selection so that selector reports whether selection is
different from previous selection.  Elimintates redundant
